 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלְלַי‎</span> **interjection** (probably onomatopoetic: compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָלָה‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***to wail***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***woe!*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>718</sup>) ==alas! woe!== followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִי‎</span> ***to me*** [[Mic.7.1|Mic 7:1]]; [[Job.10.15|Job 10:15]].
